location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to the Resident or Officer in Charge at Bushire

mods.abstract: Warden writes to acknowledge receipt of Bruce's previous letter of 19 October 1819 and its enclosed copies of correspondence with his Royal Highness Hoosein Ali Muza [Hussain Ali Mirza], concerning the Linguah [Bandar-e Lengeh] vessel captured by His Majesty's ship Curlew. Warden continues that the claim of the captors is under consideration in the Vice Admiralty Court, the findings of which will be communicated to Bruce in due course.
